TopicTitle: Revert to VAB causes radial parts to disappear or causes unassembled ship to appear in VAB floor

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win10 | CPU: Ryzen 7950x3d | GPU: EVGA RTX 3080 12GB | RAM: 32 GB

 

While building ships containing boosters mounted radially using the multiplier function (x6 in this instance), I would try to launch.  When I revert to vab, only the original booster stack is still mounted radially with parts of the others missing completely.

At other times, reverting to VAB would cause the ship to appear below the floor of the VAB in an unassembled state.

Edited June 14 by The Space Peacock
